message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that will bring you immense value. I'm willing to start with a price of $950000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $750000.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value the product holds for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $825000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to propose a price of $800000.

Hi Bob, I see you're getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I'm not willing to go below my minimum. I'm counteroffering at $825000 again. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to pay $810000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm still not willing to go below my minimum price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm counteroffering at $820000. This is my final compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price for the value the product brings.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your efforts. I am willing to pay $815000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not reach an agreement. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $820500. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in the product and meet me at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your last offer, but I am unable to meet you at $820500. I am willing to pay $820000 for the product.
